H3.text: what school did martin luther king jr received his doctorate degree from. Boston University

A4.text: King received his PhD on June 5, 1955, with a dissertation titled A Comparison of the Conceptions of God in the Thinking of Paul Tillich and Henry Nelson Wieman, at Boston University.
